column4: newbie question.  installed an rpm using alien, it down not work, and i can't seem to google a way to uninstall it *#&$^

no, it should have created a .deb file
then you did not install it :)

the file you are asking for is in no package - it is part of glibc and the name only exists during compiling of glibc.
put the complete output on the pastebin and maybe I can say something more useful
